channel.title: Comments on: Rule “Previous releases of Microsoft Visual Studio 2008” failed
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: lorraine
item.dc:creator: lorraine
item.description: Thank you! Works like charm! Thanks a zillion! You deserve wings! Really, it works!
item.content:encoded: Thank you! Works like charm! Thanks a zillion! You deserve wings! Really, it works!

item.title: By: BigDreams74
item.dc:creator: BigDreams74
item.content:encoded:
I went through exactly same options as you had. Last time I had to uninstall and re-install VS2008 it was very hectic and messy since some stuff was left behind and had to manually delete stuff from registry so this time I didnt want to go throught that again.Thank you for this great solution.

Next time I will look out for command line installation whenI get stuck

item.title: By: Habitat
item.dc:creator: Habitat
item.description: Wow!! You are my savior on this problem. I have been trying to install SQL Mgmt Studio Express 2008 for about 3 days with no luck. I have tried literally everything like: install, uninstall, update, registry settings... etc. etc.... Thank you so much !!! I have never dealt with a more frustrating process to install a developer tool. You deserve wings :) If you dont mind me asking, how did you come upon this solution?
item.content:encoded: Wow!! You are my savior on this problem. I have been trying to install SQL Mgmt Studio Express 2008 for about 3 days with no luck. I have tried literally everything like: install, uninstall, update, registry settings… etc. etc…. Thank you so much !!! I have never dealt with a more frustrating process to install a developer tool. You deserve wings ðŸ™‚ If you dont mind me asking, how did you come upon this solution?

Thanks.
